cause.description:
Hi my name is Igor Gofish, and I'm in serious financial trouble - I'm busy studying for a vet but I don't have the finances to continue my last 2 years of study.
I was hoping you can help me.
1. I want to help all aminals
2. I believe by disecting my pets I can learn more about them
3. All aminals have a right to study
cause.name: Save gofish
